name: Fun-snake-attack
tagline: A two-player extended version of Snake game developed in Python using Pygame.
body:
### About
[Snake Game](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Snake_(video_game)) is about a snake trying to eat food in an area without bumping into itself or the game is over. This extended version of snake consists of a two-player version where there are two snakes fighting for a single food block.

### Installation
The game is developed using Python 2.7 and pygame module in it.
Install [Python 2.7](https://www.python.org/download/releases/2.7/) and finally install [Pygame](http://www.pygame.org/download.shtml) to complete your installation.

### Run the Game
Run main.py using following command - python2.7 main.py to run the game.

### Authors and Contributors
@sk364, @utsavvicky

### Support or Contact
